meta.name: description
meta.content: Mildred ISD serves K-12th grade students and is located in Corsicana, TX.

div.div: 2020-21 Online Registration for RETURNING students is NOW OPEN!! This is MANDATORY for all MISD students. Please log into your Parent Portal account and complete the registration process for your child/ren.Â You can find the parent portal link on our school website,Â www.mildredisd.org.Â

article.aria-label: Schools closed for the remainder of the school year.

h3.a: Schools closed for the remainder of the school year.

div.div: The Governor of Texas issued a statement on Friday, April the 17th , closing schools for the remainder of the school year.

Monday, April 13, MISD Elementary will distribute one packet per student that will contain work for the remainder of the school year.Â To reduce handling of material and possible exposure to Covid-19, we will no longer have Monday pick-ups/drop-offs.
Per Gov. Abbott, MISD will be extending our closure through May 4th.
Navarro Coalition Stay at Home Guide.
Mildred ISD is considering offering a full day Pre-K program to students that meet certain criteria/qualifications.

article.aria-label: Mildred ISD is an A rate District

h3.a: Mildred ISD is an A rate District

div.div: Please join us in congratulating all of the faculty and staff at Mildred ISD for their hard work!

Mildred ISD is a UIL class 3A K12 grade Public School District composed of three campuses. We have approximately 725 students district-wide with approximately 308 on the Elementary campus (grades K through five); approximately 179 students on the Junior High campuses (grades 6 through 8); and approximately 238 students on the high school campus (grades 9 through 12).
Thank you for visiting our website.
